Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers

Class GodController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turn_controllers.GodController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApolloController, ArtemisController, AthenaController, AtlasController, DemeterController, HephaestusController, HestiaController, LimusController, MedusaController, MinotaurController, PanController, PrometheusController, TritonController, ZeusController
public abstract class GodController
extends java.lang.Object
Template for all the God specific turn controllers. Handles how the different phases of each turn play out.

    • canPlay

      public boolean canPlay​(Worker worker)
      Checks if the Worker can move.
      Parameters:
      worker - the active Worker
      Returns:
      true if the Worker can move, false otherwise

    • runPhases

      public java.lang.String runPhases​(Worker worker) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException, IOExceptionFromController
      Handles the basic phases of a turn: moving and building.
      Parameters:
      worker - the active Worker during this turn
      Returns:
      "godConditionAchieved" if the Player won, "next" if the game goes on
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when an exception related to ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream occurs
      IOExceptionFromController - when an IOException from a specific PlayerController occurs
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the thread handling the communication is waiting and it is interrupted before or during its activity

    • movePhase

      void movePhase() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException, IOExceptionFromController
      Handles the moving phase of the turn.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when an exception related to ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream occurs
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the thread handling the communication is waiting and it is interrupted before or during its activity
      IOExceptionFromController - when an IOException from a specific PlayerController occurs

    • buildPhase

      void buildPhase() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException, IOExceptionFromController
      Handles the building phase of the turn.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when an exception related to ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream occurs
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the thread handling the communication is waiting and it is interrupted before or during its activity
      IOExceptionFromController - when an IOException from a specific PlayerController occurs

    • checkWin

      java.lang.String checkWin()
      Checks if the active Player won.
      Returns:
      "winConditionAchieved" if the active Player won, "nope" otherwise

    • findPossibleMoves

      java.util.ArrayList<Cell> findPossibleMoves​(Cell workerPosition)
      Returns all the Cells where a Worker can move, with the only restrictions due to the general rules (other workers, domes, building levels).
      Parameters:
      workerPosition - the position of the Worker
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the Cells where a worker can move

    • findLegalMoves

      java.util.ArrayList<Cell> findLegalMoves​(Cell workerPosition, java.util.ArrayList<Cell> possibleMoves)
      Returns all the legal moves, applying possible restrictions due to active God Power Cards.
      Parameters:
      workerPosition - the position of the Worker
      possibleMoves - all the Cells where the Worker can move, with the only restrictions due to the general rules
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the Cells where a Worker can effectively move

    • findPossibleBuilds

      java.util.ArrayList<Cell> findPossibleBuilds​(Cell workerPosition)
      Returns all the Cells where a Worker can build, with the only restrictions due to the general rules (other workers and domes).
      Parameters:
      workerPosition - the position of the Worker
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the Cells where a Worker can build

    • findLegalBuilds

      java.util.ArrayList<Cell> findLegalBuilds​(Cell workerPosition, java.util.ArrayList<Cell> possibleBuilds)
      Returns all the legal builds, applying possible restrictions due to active God Power Cards.
      Parameters:
      workerPosition - the position of the Worker
      possibleBuilds - all the cells where the Worker can build, with the only restrictions due to the general rules
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the Cells where a Worker can effectively build

    • limitMoves

      java.util.ArrayList<Cell> limitMoves​(Cell workerPosition, java.util.ArrayList<Cell> possibleMoves)
      Applies the God Power associated with this GodController. Gets an ArrayList containing all the cells where an opponent Worker can move and creates another ArrayList, removing from the first one all the Cells that are not allowed due to this God Power Card.
      Parameters:
      workerPosition - the position of the Worker
      possibleMoves - all the Cells where the Worker can move, considering only the game restrictions
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the Cells where the Worker is actually able to build

    • limitBuilds

      java.util.ArrayList<Cell> limitBuilds​(Cell workerPosition, java.util.ArrayList<Cell> possibleBuilds)
      Applies the God Power associated with this GodController. Gets an ArrayList containing all the Cells where an opponent Worker can build and creates another ArrayList, removing from the first one all the Cells that are not allowed due to this God Power Card.
      Parameters:
      workerPosition - the position of the Worker
      possibleBuilds - all the Cells where the Worker is able to build, considering only the game restrictions
      Returns:
      all the Cells where the Worker is actually able to build

    • displayMove

      void displayMove​(CellView startPosition, CellView endPosition, Card godPower) throws IOExceptionFromController
      Creates an HashMap containing the starting position and the final position of a move. Calls the broadcastMove method so that the move can be properly displayed on screen.
      Parameters:
      startPosition - the starting position of a move
      endPosition - the final position of a move
      godPower - the God Power Card who allowed this move, eventually null in a basic move
      Throws:
      IOExceptionFromController - when an IOException from a specific PlayerController occurs

    • displayMove

      void displayMove​(CellView startPosition1, CellView endPosition1, CellView startPosition2, CellView endPosition2, Card godPower) throws IOExceptionFromController
      Creates an HashMap containing two couples of positions: the starting position and the final position of a move for two players. Calls the broadcastMove method so that this double move can be properly displayed on screen.
      Parameters:
      startPosition1 - the starting position of a move for the first player
      endPosition1 - the final position of a move for the first player
      startPosition2 - the starting position of a move for the second player
      endPosition2 - the final position of a move for the second player
      godPower - the God Power Card who allowed this move
      Throws:
      IOExceptionFromController - when an IOException from a specific PlayerController occurs

    • displayBuild

      void displayBuild​(CellView buildPosition, Card godPower) throws IOExceptionFromController
      Calls the broadcastBuild method so that this build can properly be displayed on screen.
      Parameters:
      buildPosition - the position of the build
      godPower - the God Card that eventually allowed this build
      Throws:
      IOExceptionFromController - when an IOException from a specific PlayerController occurs
